snippet.title: DYNAST.IO Gameplay Trailer
snippet.description:
http://dynast.io/ - link to the game

Dynast.io This is a multiplayer browser game with RPG elements. Here you need to survive, build bases, extract resources, craft, create clans, fight monsters, play football, open new biomes, create personal chests. There are shields, hats, boomerangs, fire cannons, throwing knives and shurikens, motorcycles, cat hook, Santa Claus, as well as other powerful bosses. The caps here have special properties. Some caps speed up, some make you stronger or stronger, and some caps make you invisible. I can't list everything.
You can freeze in the winter biome, but you can fight and build a stove to keep warm. Here you can get snowballs and throw them at others. Some weapons allow you to repel throwing attacks.
And also all these weapons in Dynast.io it can be stored in personal chests forever. This means that you can play more than once, but collect things in dunast, play, turn off the computer, then turn it back on and you will have things again.
No cheats will work here, because there are constant updates and the fight against cheaters. Hack Dynast.io it won't work, that's for sure. The dupers in the dunast will not last long either, they will be banned. Because everything should be fair. You need to earn items and weapons in the dynasty yourself. And download the levels. Experienced programmers are working on the game, who are constantly coming up with something interesting and new. You can also offer your ideas if you go to the VK group https://vk.com/dynastio, or to the official Discord
The game is Dynastio or in another way Dynastio, and someone calls it simply Dynast. Or a Dynasty. Of course, it is somewhat similar to moomoo.io (mumu io) or starve.io (starv io), or devast.io (devast io), but here we can say that she absorbed only the best of these games and went far ahead. And it's unlikely that these games have test servers, Knightley. Nightly. And in Dynast.io there is. And there are also secrets in the game that no one knows about. Dunast is so good that you can even play it through your phone (smartphone)
The trailer was made by XCBG! Play in Dynast.io and subscribe to the channel!
